name: Trappy Mine
description:
Race against time, using your pickaxe and bombs to mine to the bottom where treasure awaits. Avoid spikes, explosions and crushing crates and collect as much coal, diamond and coin as possible to compete for the top spot on the leaderboards.

Full Gamepad and Keyboard controls
10 colour palettes selectable from Options
GameJolt Leaderboard support

Default Controls (editable in game)Keyboard

Run - Left arrow/right arrow
Jump- Space
Use Pickaxe - C
Use Pickaxe upwards - C + up arrow
Use Pickaxe downwards - C + down arrow
Throw Bomb - X
Place Bomb - X + down arrow
Look Down - S

Gamepad (tested on DS4, but should work on all similar gamepads)

Run - left/right d-pad
Jump - Cross
Use Pickaxe - Square
Use Pickaxe upwards - Square + d-pad up
Use Pickaxe downwards - Square + d-pad down
Throw Bomb - Circle
Place Bomb - Circle + d-pad down
Look Down - Triangle
